name: MyTaskMemo
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my task memo
des:
My task memo is a tool for registering and managing your task items.


To register a task item, for example, say "register walking", or "walking register". 
To record “performed" of the task item, for example, say "ID2 performed". 
To change “performed" to "not performed", for example, say "ID2 not performed". 
To check all data, say "all data check". 
To delete all the data, say "all data delete” or “delete all”. 
To delete the data individually, say, for example, "ID3 delete", or "delete ID3”.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
